description.value:
Requirements You're in bright light.

By keeping your feathers clean and sleek, you can catch the light across your wings to create a startling glare in the eyes of a creature within 20 feet. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure). Regardless of their result, the target is temporarily immune to Sunbird Glare for 10 minutes.
